creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
In 1.4 (trunk from svn) I get a blank page when I try to edit a page with
bitflux (using cocoon2.1.6).  I tracked this down to
src/webapp/lenya/xslt/bxe/aggregate.xsl namespace issues.

I will attach a patch that got me up and editing with bitflux

creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
Created attachment 13673
I just made the xhtml namespace explicit so bxe element and others without namespace would be matched

This got rid of the blank page for me and allowed me to edit a page (and save
changes) with bitflux.	I believe that this is a problem caused by upgrading to
cocoon2.1.6

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Added dev@lenya.apache.org to CC-list.

Not sure if the patch applies to 1.4 and 1.2.1.
